org.jacp.api.coordinator
Interface ICoordinator<L,A,M>

Type Parameters:
L - defines the action listener type
A - defines the basic action type
M - defines the basic message type
All Known Subinterfaces:
IComponentCoordinator<L,A,M>, IPerspectiveCoordinator<L,A,M>
public interface ICoordinator<L,A,M>

Defines a basic observer for component messages; handles the message and delegate to responsible component.

Author:
Andy Moncsek

delegateMessage

void delegateMessage(java.lang.String target,
                     IAction<A,M> action)
Delegate message from a subcomponent to target perspective. If no target was found for current action in this perspective, delegate the message to upper level (the workbench) and try to find the component in an other perspective.

Parameters:
target -
action -

id -
Returns:
the corresponding component, perspective or null when nothing found
